If FRAME# changes from LOW to HIGH, then IRDY# is LOW.
If DEVSEL# is LOW and IRDY# is LOW and STOP# is HIGH and TRDY# is HIGH, then IRDY# is LOW in the next cycle.
If DEVSEL# is LOW and IRDY# is LOW and STOP# is HIGH and TRDY# is HIGH, then FRAME# remains stable in the next cycle.
If FRAME# is HIGH and IRDY# is LOW and TRDY# is LOW, then IRDY# is HIGH in the next cycle.
If FRAME# is HIGH and IRDY# is LOW and STOP# is LOW, then IRDY# is HIGH in the next cycle.
